dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I decided to cut the middle man and just talk to her.

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: Oh how did you know it was me!? Wow this must be what they mean by a deep connection!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I watched Lucci dancing back and forth and found myself sighing. She really is too happy.
